stimulusHtml:
Scoring Criteria
Score Scale 0-4

4 Correctly identifies the century or period of the works. Discusses at least one way in which each interior is the result of religious beliefs of the period. Adduces some specific historical or art historical material.

3 Correctly identifies the century or period of the works. Discussion tends to be more general than a 4 and is weaker in art historical material.

OR

Misidentifies the century or period of the works but is otherwise a 4. A special case may arise when the image on the right has been convincingly associated with another faith tradition that shares similar architectural forms and interiors.

2 Correctly identifies the century or period of only one of the works and discusses how the religious beliefs of the culture appear in that interior.

OR

Misidentifies the century or period of the works. Generalized discussion of the religious beliefs and the interiors of the paintings.

1 Correctly identifies the century or period of the works but offers nothing else of merit.

OR

Fails to correctly identify the century. Discusses one aspect of one of the paintings that connects the church interior to religious beliefs.

0 Makes an attempt, but response is without merit with respect to the two tasks, rewrites the question, or makes only incorrect statement.
